mapper.select: SELECT SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(RDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 1, 8) AS RDATE , SUM(PRICE) AS PRICE FROM SALES WHERE SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(RDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 5, 2) = ${MONTH} GROUP BY SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(RDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 1, 8) ORDER BY RDATE
SELECT SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(RDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 1, 6) AS RDATE , SUM(PRICE) / 1000000 AS PRICE , GENDER FROM SALES GROUP BY SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(RDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 1, 6), GENDER ORDER BY RDATE, GENDER

SELECT SUM(PRICE) AS SUM, ROUND(AVG(PRICE)) AS AVG, MAX(PRICE) AS MAX, MIN(PRICE) AS MIN FROM (SELECT SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(RDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 1, 8) AS RDATE , SUM (PRICE) AS PRICE FROM SALES GROUP BY SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(RDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 1, 8) ORDER BY RDATE )
